alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 09 at 2:07PM EST until January 11 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM EST MONDAY THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to locally 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lake, Geauga, Cuyahoga, Ashtabula Inland and Ashtabula Lakeshore counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM EST Monday through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will increase in intensity starting early Monday morning and will likely reach maximum strength during and after the Monday morning commute. Snow will become less organized Monday afternoon and diminish quickly Monday night. The heaviest snow should occur over eastern Cuyahoga County into southwestern Lake and northern Geauga Counties.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake
